features: Built-in Face Exoliating Brush - The silicone bristles on our exfoliating face scrub brush give you a deep yet gentle facial scrub. 2-3 pumps of our daily foam face wash with 2 minutes of exfoliating scrub circular strokes will help tighten open pores to increase skin protection

Safe for Sensitive Skin - Enjoy a mild face cleaner foam cleanser wash that gently leaves your skin feeling nourished & renewed. An ACV Face Cleanser for men, women, and teens gentle solution eliminates having to deal with stinging or irritating cleaners ever again with our acne cleanser face wash

Protect Against Acne & Blackheads - When going through your routine of facial skin care products using our pore cleanser is the way to be proactive with your acne treatment. Arm yourself with an acne cleanser face wash that helps reduce and control acne breakouts without overdrying your skin

Plant-Powered Natural Ingredients - Feel good with a brightening face wash that uses natural ingredients to cleanse, hydrate, and help repair damaged skin, cracks and blemishes. We use vital nutrients from apple cider vinegar, aloe vera, and vitamins B5 & E with no sulfates, alcohol, or other ingredients that would dry out your skin

WOW Skin Science Promise - At WOW Skin Science we stand by our products and offer a full refund warranty if you experience any issues with your WOW Skin Science product. Simply contact WOW Skin Science directly through the Amazon messaging system and we will be happy to assist you with any questions, issues or difficulties you encounter. 100% customer satisfaction is what we strive for at WOW Skin Science
body.description: Our WOW Apple Cider Vinegar Foaming Face Wash w/ Brush is our new facial pore cleanser that comes with a silicone brush to help cleanse, exfoliate, and drive your skin back to flawless, supple skin. The gentle exfoliating formula is a rich foam that dissolves and washes away dead skin cells to allow your pores to breathe. We are excited to bring you to the next level of skincare by taking an already great face wash and making it better. Don't settle for regular, get the best face wash for all skin types.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels great!
reviews.reviewText: Leaves skin feeling squeaky clean. Keep in shower, so easy to use! Love the scrubber on tip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t burn your eyes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3.4 oz bottle is not 3.4 oz. The product is good though.
reviews.reviewText: The product is amazing! I have oily skin and washing with this in the morning really helps control the shine under my makeup. I love how my face feels and I even love the smell (your mileage may vary on that, it does smell strong). The 5 oz bottle lasts for a LONG time (washing my face once a day).My only complaints are A.) the 3.4oz bottle is NOT 3.4 oz. It is 150 ml. I've tried to order the 3.4 oz twice, and both times got a 5oz bottle. I needed a smaller side for carry-on travel, because you can't exactly pour this facewash into a smaller bottle because of the pump. So I'm a bit annoyed by that especially as I have a trip coming up and can't find a travel-size version of this wash anywhere.In addition, my last order came in completely empty. It had spilled in transit. I was able to get a refund through customer service, but it's still annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Dec 9, 2023 12:29 PMI love the WOW Apple Cider Vinegar Exfoliating face wash. It comes with it's own mini scrub brush that works beautifully on your face. My skin always feels soft and fresh after every use. Keeps my skin feeling soft and refreshed all day. Love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 2nd time ordering. It lasts a long time and I like how it makes my skin feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Should we really put vinegar on our skin?
reviews.reviewText: My skin is thick and oily very oily. There's not much I can use on it that will dry it out or seem too harsh, but lately, I've been wanting to treat my skin more gently; just because it can withstand a good scrub and cleansers others consider too harsh, doesn't mean I should. So I tried this. And it's drying, and dries my skin out so fast, it stings. It changes the surface pH of your skin, which leads me to wonder, should we be putting vinegar on our skin? This product sure makes you wonder. The foam brush is very soft, too soft, perhaps, and the foam that squeezes out of it mostly winds up on the sides of the bush and won't come off until you wash it off. I like the idea, but the execution, from the too soft brush, the product that comes out of the brush and winds up mostly on the side of the brush, to the vinegar based face wash itself, isn't the best. My face doesn't even feel cleaner afterwards, certainly doesn't feel more exfoliated, it just feels more dry, like i just used a really harsh chemical to dry my face out but not really clean it. I don't have that "clean" feeling afterwards, like my pours are clean instead of just dried out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GET THIS NOW!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the hunt for a more natural face wash that wouldn't tear my face up! My face is sensitive to scrubs scents and certain products but the reviews on this were good so I figured why not? My skin was SO dry and dull from the cold weather hitting recently. Bleh. No kidding... I saw and felt an improvement in my skin after the first use. Smooth as could be. I moisturized right away to hold that goodness in! I use it everyday or every other day and it has actually shrunk the pores around my nose and cIeared the blackheads. This face wash has done wonders for my skin so I'll definitely be buying from now on!

reviews.reviewTitle: If you have SD, buy this!
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from seborrheic dermatitis and this face wash has made a HUGE difference for me. My symptoms are almost gone. So happy I found this product
